00032   public static function render($controller, $action, $params=NULL){
00033     $__script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1); 
00035     $__view__ = "views/$controller/$action.php";
00036 
00037     if(!file_exists("views/layouts/$controller.php")){ // a controller without layout
00038       if(!file_exists($__view__))
00039         self::error($controller, $action, "$__view__ does not exist.");
00040         require($__view__);       // directly includes the view
00041         // $params can be used within the layout and view.
00042     }else{
00043       // include the layout
00044       require("views/layouts/$controller.php");
00045       
00047       // $params can be used within the layout and view.
00048     }
00049     exit(0);
00050   }

00058   public static function redirect($url, $_get=NULL){
00059     $script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1);
00060     
00061     if(is_array($_get))
00062       header( "location: $script_path$url?".http_build_query($_get) );
00063     else
00064       header( "location: $script_path$url" );
00065       
00066     exit(0);
00067   }

00070      methods for views and layouts. called with self:: namespace     */

00078   public static function path_to($controller, $action, $_get=NULL){
00079     $script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1);
00080     if(is_array($_get))
00081       return $script_path.$controller.'/'.$action.'?'.http_build_query($_get);
00082     else
00083       return $script_path.$controller.'/'.$action;
00084   }
00085 
00087   public static function stylesheet_link_tag($file_name){
00088     $script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1);
00089     srand(); $salt = rand();
00090     return "<link href=\"$script_path$file_name?$salt\" rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" />\n";
00091   }
00092   
00094   public static function javascript_include_tag($file_name){
00095     $script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1);
00096     srand(); $salt = rand();
00097     return "<script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$script_path$file_name?$salt\"></script>\n";
